product_name: LancomeSkin Feels Good Hydrating Tinted Moisturizer with SPF 23
summary: SummaryLancôme Skin Feels Good Hydrating Tinted Moisturizer is a buildable yet lightweight foundation that gives skin a healthy glow with SPF 23.
details: DetailsFeaturesA hydrating and lightweight oil-free tinted moisturizer foundation with SPF 23 that is infused with antioxidants, perfect for creating that "no makeup" natural makeup lookBenefitsA foundation cream that feels like a moisturizer leaving skin with a glowy skin finishBuildable coverage, perfect for everyday wearContaining SPF 23, it is enriched with moringa seed and hyaluronic acidAn oil-free formula that leaves skin feeling velvety smooth with a radiant glowWill not clog poresAvailable in many shadesItem 2524132How To UseApply Lancôme Advanced Génifique Anti-Aging Face Serum onto skin.For sheer coverage, start in the center of the face, applying Skin Feels Good Tinted Moisturizer and blend, evenly outwards.For medium coverage, dot desired amount of Skin Feels Good around the face and blend evenly.For full-coverage makeup, after using the medium coverage method, apply extra Skin Feels Good to the areas desired for buildable coverage, and lightly use fingers, brush/or a wet beauty blender tool to "press in."IngredientsAqua / Water, Glycerin, Caprylyl Methicone, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Propanediol, Dimethicone, Rosa Gallica Flower Extract, Sorbitol, Triethoxysilylethyl Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Dimethicone/PEG-10/15 Crosspolymer, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Moringa Oleifera Seed Extract, Alumina, Disodium EDTA, Disodium Phosphate, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Propylene Glycol, Dipropylene Glycol, Citric Acid, BHT, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin, Parfum / Fragrance. May Contain: CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 / Iron Oxides, CI 77891 / Titanium Dioxide.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply Lancôme Advanced Génifique Anti-Aging Face Serum onto skin.For sheer coverage, start in the center of the face, applying Skin Feels Good Tinted Moisturizer and blend, evenly outwards.For medium coverage, dot desired amount of Skin Feels Good around the face and blend evenly.For full-coverage makeup, after using the medium coverage method, apply extra Skin Feels Good to the areas desired for buildable coverage, and lightly use fingers, brush/or a wet beauty blender tool to "press in."

reviews.headline: Too dark
reviews.comments: Lightest color too!!

reviews.headline: Decades of Lancome
reviews.comments: I've been wearing Lancome for over a decade. I love this tinted moisturizer as a simple way to add some color and cover redness without feeling like I'm caking on foundation. It is lightweight and ideal when I want to add just a little coverage for the day.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: I have used this product for about 5 years and love it. I couldn't find it when I recently visited Ulta but the staff was incredibly helpful. I also thought I lost my phone in the store and went back to find it.  It was very close to closing time but everyone was very helpful in looking but we didn't find it, I had left it at my office but so thankful they helped me look for it.  One of the few companies who still have customer service oriented employees.

reviews.headline: I love this product
reviews.comments: This tinted moisturizer is so nice and light.  My skin glows.

reviews.headline: The  Best@
reviews.comments: I love this foundation as it us so light, especially for warm and hot summer days.

reviews.headline: Best foundation ever
reviews.comments: Used this blush the supergoop super screen cream and the supergoop unseen sun screen (as a primer) give me the glowiest looking skin! Love love love it!!

reviews.headline: Way too orange
reviews.comments: The skin tint is good, but the shade range is ATROCIOUS ! I bought the two lightest shades back when they were on sale, had super high hopes because I love Lancome foundations, but these pull soo orange and warm on my fair skin (I have neutral to cool undertone, fair) I can hardly wear them, I need a super light concealer to make it work. The quality is good, it makes my skin feel and look dewy and healthy, but my goodness the shades are awful.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Best, lightweight, skinlike, dewy coverage tonted moisturizer/foundation, i will never use anything else!

reviews.headline: Not bad but could be better
reviews.comments: I like that it's lightweight, but the product has a tendency to pill no matter what I use to apply it. I'll finish the bottle, but I wouldn't buy it again. The coverage seemed fine, but as a pale girl, even the lightest shade was too dark.

reviews.headline: High hopes but disappointed
reviews.comments:
I have purchased lancome on and off for the last 15 years. Love the skin care, but they have priced me out. 

I tried so many primers, skin care routines, i even got a facial to see if that was the issue. 

The foundation will not absorb, the tint runs on the darker range and oxidized within 30 minutes of application. 

I will not purchase. I tried giving it away, no luck. No one likes patchy application

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: Love the way it goes on

reviews.headline: I will buy from now on
reviews.comments: No breakouts so that's a plus!! Very sensitive skin I have!!! Doesn't take much to use I like that!!

reviews.headline: I will buy this from now on!
reviews.comments: I love how it doesn't take much to use and it lasted all day I also have sensitive skin and I didn't have any breakouts!

reviews.headline: I don't recommend
reviews.comments:
-the pump is bad, sometimes it just squirted out and stained my clothes. 
-it easily cooked off of I touch my face or my clothes touches my face, leaving a line on my face (if that makes sense). 
-I wanted to like it bc it's expensive. Too bad I can't return it. 
-Just fyi I have oily skin.

reviews.headline: New HG daily pick
reviews.comments: I have been looking and looking (and looking) for something with enough coverage to cancel out my redness that also looks like skin. This has more coverage than many skin tints I've used but the finish on this one is so good my skin looks both natural and nearly flawless. It is kind of a miracle.

reviews.headline: Looks awful
reviews.comments:
This stuff transfers onto EVERYTHING. I was so shocked at how bad this product was. It feels like it just sits on top of my skin and it wipes off so easily, leaving my face spotty and blotchy. This product doesn't sink into or stick to the skin at all. Settles into lines and looks greasy. I took this on a trip to Europe and was so disgusted with the performance I literally just threw it away. The good reviews must be fake or bought and paid for. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone. 

Originally bought it because they were out of the stick foundation. This product was a complete waste of money.

reviews.headline: Lovely
reviews.comments: I almost returned this because the smell is off putting. Glad I didn't because its provides perfect coverage for my dry mature skin.

reviews.headline: Never Going Back
reviews.comments: I've been using this for a couple years now, and I will never go back to foundation. It's so light in your skin it doesn't feel like I have anything on. It makes my skin look dewy, and it blends great on my skin!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: Tinted moisturizer is a perfect match. I get a lot of compliments when I use my Lancôme.

reviews.headline: Oxidizes! Not flattering
reviews.comments: I have good skin and at 50 I don't need much coverage. Just need something to even out redness. This wasn't for me! It aged me. This stuff settled in every fine line and crease and gave me texture where I never have texture. I like Lancome, but this one's a dud. I even tried it with Lancome moisturizer and concealer. thought I mixed too many brands. it looked awful. plus it oxidized so bad! off to work I go..looking old and orange! returning to Ulta on the way home...

media.headline: I love this product so far

faceoff_positive.comments:
I'm a guy and I've been looking for a tinted moisturizer and/or foundation for a long time that wasn't heavy or matte. I wanted something that was just enough to even my skin tone without making it look like I had makeup on. I saw Skin Feels Good on Facebook and decided to give it a try. I loved that it had Moringa Root in it for anti-aging benefits as well as an SPF higher than 10 or 15. After trying B.B. creams and light coverage foundations from all the other major cosmetic brands and nothing working to my liking because they were all too greasy feeling after a few hours due to oily skin , I figured what did I have to lose.

I just received it today and I was concerned by the shade I chose (04N Golden Sand) because it looked too orange for a neutral but it was the closest neutral shade that seemed dark enough for my skin and undertone. Plus my local counters don't carry it so I couldn't sample ahead of time. 

I couldn't be happier with the product!! Blended in perfectly and super light coverage just what I wanted. Plus after 7 hours, my skin doesn't feel oily or greasy! I'm very impressed!! It hasn't transferred or rolled off my skin either. I did use Visionnaire 1 minute blur as a primer too. I'll update this review if my opinion changes but as with most other Lancome products I use, I'm sure I'll continue to be happy!!
faceoff_positive.headline: Awesome for oily skin!

faceoff_negative.comments: I am so disappointed in the discontinuation of the Bienfait BB Cream.  I was told this was the best substitute, and I tried out every shade of Skin Feels Good that was close to my skin tone, but nothing works.  Bienfait BB Cream in Clair 2 blends perfectly with my skin tone and has been my go to product for many years.  It?s the reason I became a Lanc?me loyalist.  Now I will have to find another brand of BB cream.  I don?t like to spend time shopping around, and when I find a product I love, I stick with it and the brand.  If I have to buy a BB cream from another brand, I will most likely start using some of their other products instead of Lanc?me as well.  I really don?t understand the decision to eliminate a perfect makeup and skincare basic like Bienfait BB Cream.  If it?s not broken, don?t fix it.
faceoff_negative.headline: Bring back Bienfait BB Cream
